title: Taliyah's Login Theme: When?
body: i'm so sick pressing loop button for her homecoming trailer..

replies.body: You'll be able to hear it as soon as her login screen goes on PBE. Can't say when unfortunately :P

> [{quoted}](name=Chemicalseb,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=U4PskE0J,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-05T16:15:07.408+0000)
>
> You'll be able to hear it as soon as her login screen goes on PBE. Can't say when unfortunately :P

next week? you can say this

EDIT: just got this gift https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7A0SjC-Qbls
Hey Seb! Are you guys planning on uploading the Mecha Zero Sion login theme to the Soundcloud anytime soon? I loved that piece quite a bit :D

Thanks mate! Glad to hear it {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Awesome thanks :D

Ever thought of putting "Lore Login themes" both int erms of Art and Music? A theme for Shurima, Demacia, Targon with a wallpaper featuring the characters involved ala "Season Login theme" would be awesome :D
can haz mashup with Azir's pwetty ples?
Oh my god I love it.

No longer useful in this situation, but if you put "endless" in front of "youtube" for any video url (eg, www.endlessyoutube.com), you can autoloop any video. Maybe it will come in handy for you in the future :)
When it is ready, it is ready. keep your pants on skywalker.
